round_details.name: PRELIMS
details: Each team must submit a real-world scenario-based problem statement
Discuss potential impact in a PPT Presentation

round_details.name: FINALS
details: Deploy automation solutions and present them during the event

events.name: RED BREAK GREEN
rules: FIND THE LANGUAGE+ CLONE THE SITE
Red and green ribbon coding challenge

judging_criteria.criteria: Cumulative points from correctly answered questions and the best clone of the given site
Points based on dedication shown while coding; Event Incharges oversee rules adherence and dispute resolution

events.name: E-SPORT
rules: TDM clash with specific rules (M416 only, no pistol, slide off)

round_details.name: PRELIMS
details: Top 10 teams proceed to the final round

round_details.name: FINALS
details: Select 18 to 25 players with specific composition
Calculate total points for all players; Team with highest points wins

judging_criteria.criteria: Cumulative points from correctly answered questions
Total points for all players in each team; Team with highest points declared the winner
